resources.string: Enter category in form of [gain] [knowledge] in [subject]

Community lives by creating and curating courses.\nWe encourage new and current members to share their knowledge by creating new or contributing to existing course.\nIf you can do some valuable work, solve valuable tasks, please share courses which allows them to obtain skills to do this work, to solve this tasks.

Work on the project is suspended and server is shutdown. 

After gathering first feedback product roadmap had been reviewed and shift to integration with existing communities built around Q&A on different topics such as Яндекс.Кью and stackexchange. First stage of negotiation didn't bring necessary results, next ideas were put in backlog and focus moved to another product. 

If you want to be informed after release of the next version, please send an email on dmitrii.kazakov@gmail.com with topic Collaborative Education. 

Thank you for your interest!
